name: Quantum Protocol
summary: A deckbuilding card game where it's always your turn. Play as the master hackers of Quantum and take on the most dangerous malware in the world. Every action matters. Make plays, upgrade your deck, and break the enemy board!
info:
• 别名: 量子协议
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Deckbuilding card game
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020-11-04
  • 官方网站: https://www.kaiomeris.com/quantum/
  • 开发: Kaio Meris
  • 发行: Kaio Meris
